author: markt
msg: Further improvements to the fix for bug 39088
- Remove dependency on jsp-api using Tim Funk's suggested approach
- Add the recursion part of the patch I missed previously
- Handle the case where initCause() has been used rather than the nesting mechanism provided by the well known type

Testing showed that ErrorReportValve was not getting to the root of some of the admittedly crazy sets of nested exceptions I was testing with so this has also been updated to use the same approach as StandardWrapper

author: crossley
msg: Use same width as existing w.a.o/ads/adserver.txt

author: jkaputin
msg: WODEN-120 Changed the WSDLReader API so that the
readWSDL methods return Description instead of
and test cases to match this API change.

author: nagy
msg: Added a log correlation field to the MessageContext so that it is easier to match related entries within a log file.  Using the field (accessible through the getLogCorrelationID(), getLogIDString(), or toString() methods) should provide increased log readability irrespective of thread switches or message persistence/restart.  I'm sure that I didn't catch all of the log entries that should make use of the id.
